problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the two circles with point O as the center, the chord AB of the great circle is tangent to the small circle at point C, and OA intersects the small circle at point D. If OD = N_0, tan∠OAB = \frac{N_1}{N_2}, then the length of AB is ( )
raw_answer: 解:连接OC,∵大圆的弦AB切小圆于点C,∴OC⊥AB,∴AB=2AC,∵OD=2,∴OC=2,∵tan∠OAB=\frac{1}{2},∴AC=4,∴AB=8,故选:C．
